/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of gray and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
